attributes.action: not give criminals a second chance if they breach their parole conditions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Petition that if a convicted murderer breaches their parole regulations, they are then kept in prison for life, and for their life to cease in prison'

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Ministry of Justice.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
